item.title: Wish List
item.description: When I grow up I would like … Several years ago, if I had been asked what I would have liked to do when I grew up, I think I would never have thought of making the list that you will see below. I have been a developer for more than 12 years, doing Front, back, devops, big data and a period as lead developer. I am passionate about my work and I like to share with others.
